credit_line: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: needlepoint counted thread embroidery
description: Worked in needlepoint in browns, greens, neutrals, off-white and light blue on a loose linen mesh. "Primitive" style, composed of irregularly shaped blocks with different motifs, including a castle, a house, a garden, sailing ships, male and female figures, animals, birds, insects, trees, a man on horseback, etc.
name: Sampler
